### Data Camp
The second [Data Camp](https://www.datacamp.com/){target="_blank"} module is due next Wednesday and covers the the tidyverse family of functions in R which we will be using throughout the remainder of the course. In particular, the sections are:

- Data wrangling^[Please get used to this term!]
- Data visualization
- Grouping and summarizing
- Types of visualizations
